text: You do some math using your watch.  Fancy!
You press some buttons on your watch.  Digital watches are a pretty neat idea.
You have nothing to calculate, so you type 95*843.  Classy.
The world may have ended, but you have a calculator watch.  You admire it.
You start calculating your odds of long term survival, then get sad and stop.
You do some very important math, right on your wrist.
After doing some math on your wrist, you realize humans will never again reach such a pinnacle of microcomputing.
At the end of the world, nothing is as relaxing as doing a little math on your watch.
